channel.title: So and So has logged off
channel.description:
hey guys i was wondering if anyone can help me make it so when people log off, it says that they did i have the log in one but thats easy and simple but the log off one i tried disconnect = true but it didnt work does anyone have any ideas?
317 delta btw

item.title: So and So has logged off
item.dc:creator: @frostscapeserver frostscapeserver
item.description:
@frostscapeserver wrote:

[quote=“iamapker, post:3, topic:344419”]ok i found the logout() but how would the code be?

if (playerRights == 2) && logout() { yell("Admin-"+playerName+" Has Logged Off!"); }
That’s only set for if an admin logs out. You have to add one for every player right. Try:

if (playerRights == 0) && logout() { yell("+playerName+ Has Logged Off!"); } i tried that but didnt work lol[/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: So and So has logged off
